## Problem
What is currently missing, inefficient, confusing, or limiting?

Why does this need improvement?

## User Impact

Who benefits from this change?

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Feature behaves as described
- [ ] Does not break existing functionality
- [ ] Works in both dev and production
- [ ] Covered by tests (if applicable)
- [ ] Docs updated (if needed)
